thread.title: Steve Banegas
thread.title_full: United Capital Source reviewed by Steve Banegas

author: Steve Banegas
title: Steve Banegas
text:
Aaron was and is a tremendous asset to our firm as he relentlessly pursued our loan and made it happen. In fact, we are committed to only using Aaron and his team of experts from this point on.
Thank you Aaron!
Steve Banegas
COO & Chief People Officer
1st Service Solutions
